transArray.content: The front desk is very beautiful

Hello dear guests, it is full of love that warms the hearts of Orange people. Although the encounter is short, the memories are eternal. I hope you will look back and be in a good mood every day! Thank you very much for your compliments on the front desk. We hope that our service will bring you a pleasant stay. We will continue to work hard to live up to your trust! All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your every visit and wish you a happy life and smooth work! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
